title: Lightly customized Neovim config
description: This configuration is very light on resources and enables Neovim to maintain its native speed.

title: Heavily customized Neovim config
description: This is a configuration heavy on resources. It has a lot of added features, but the main drawback is performance.

title: LazyVim(Neovim distro)
description: LazyVim is a preconfigured Neovim distro that comes with a lot of quality-of-life features preconfigured. It is made by the same developer who created lazy.nvim package manager.

title: NvChad(Neovim distro)
description: NvChad is similar to LazyVim, except it has a little more features preconfigured. It is not as popular as LazyVim, though.

title: VSCode-inspired Neovim config
description: This is a Neovim configuration that is heavily inspired by the VSCode theme.

title: AstroNvim(Neovim distro)
description: AstroNvim is a Neovim distribution, similar to LazyVim. It also has community plugins, so users can add more functionality easier.

title: Solarized config(using solarized theme)
description: This is a simple configuration that uses the solarized theme, which is very unique.

title: Transparent config
description: This is a configuration that has a transparent theme, so it looks more visually appealing.

title: Tokyonight config(using tokyonight theme)
description: This is a Neovim configuration that uses the Tokyonight theme, which can be very relaxing to look at.
